newsitem.title: GREECE: ING'S PROTOPAPADAKIS JOINS BANCO SANTANDER.
newsitem.headline: ING'S PROTOPAPADAKIS JOINS BANCO SANTANDER.

text.p: Equities analyst Yannis Protopapadakis, formerly with ING Barings, has joined Banco Santander and will head its new equities research office in Greece, market sources told Reuters.
Reuters contacted Protopapadakis who confirmed the above but did not give further details.
Banco Santander, a leading player in Latin American markets, is now making a move in the mediterranean markets.
It also recruited analyst Atif Cezairli from ING Barings in Turkey to head its planned new office in Turkey, sources said.
Protopapadakis, 31, a CFA, is a graduate of Oxford University. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
